detaileddescription.para: LRU_Init: Init the LRU list.
Init the Hash Table .

parameterdescription.para: A structure of type lru_parameter_t which contains the values used to init the LRU.
Pointer to an integer to contain the status for the operation.

simplesect.para: NULL if init failed, the pointeur to the hashtable otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: LRU_invalidate: Tag an entry as invalid.
Tag an entry as invalid, this kind of entry will be put off the LRU (and sent back to the pool) when a garbagge collection will be performed.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the list to be managed.
Pointer to the entry to be tagged.

simplesect.para: LRU_LIST_SUCCESS if successfull, other values show an error.

detaileddescription.para: LRU_new_entry : acquire a new entry from the pool.
acquire a new entry from the pool. If pool is empty, a new chunck is added to complete the operation.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the list to be managed.
Pointer to an integer to contain the status for the operation.

simplesect.para: NULL if init failed, the pointeur to the hashtable otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: LRU_gc_invalid : garbagge collection for invalid entries.
Read the whole LRU list and put the invalid entries back to the pool.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the list to be managed.

simplesect.para: An integer to contain the status for the operation.

detaileddescription.para: LRU_invalidate_by_function: Browse the lru to test if entries should ne invalidated.
Browse the lru to test if entries should ne invalidated. This function is used for garbagge collection

parameterdescription.para: [IN] function used to identify an entry to be tagged invalid. This function returns TRUE if entry will be tagged invalid

simplesect.para: LRU_LIST_SUCCESS if ok, other values shows an error

detaileddescription.para: LRU_apply_function: apply the same function to every LRU entry, but do not change their states.
apply the same function to every LRU entry, but do not change their states.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] function used to be runned on every entry. If this function return FALSE, the loop stops.

simplesect.para: LRU_LIST_SUCCESS if ok, other values shows an error

detaileddescription.para: HashTable_Print: Print information about the LRU (mostly for debugging purpose).
Print information about the LRU (mostly for debugging purpose).

briefdescription.para: Management of the thread safe LRU lists.
